name: Burning Oil Mastery
description: Improves all Burning Oil skills and unlocks new abilities

ranks.effect: Reduces the damage received by the oil pot and the user. The user cannot be knocked down, pushed back, pulled, launched, stunned, dazed, floated, sunk, feared, or taunted.
Basic Burning Oil attacks burn one supply from target
Burning Shell: Creates a fiery dome that reflects projectiles
